TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Enables Reading Omens
[ICON_BULLET]Disables Omen Effects
[ICON_BULLET]Bad Omen Effects are Always Mitigated
%D1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "Heed the omens, the end is nigh!" (%d2 [NUM2:turn:turns])
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Omens are scaled at %d1%
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Omens are mitigated by %d1%
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You can always mitigate bad omens
[ICON_BULLET]Reduces Bad Omen Chance by %d1% in all Cities
[ICON_BULLET]Increases Bad Omen Chance by %d1% in all Cities
[ICON_BULLET]Increases Omen Effects by %d1% in all Cities
[ICON_BULLET]Decreases Omen Effects by %d1% in all Cities
[ICON_BULLET]Reduces Bad Omen Chance by %d1%
[ICON_BULLET]Increases Bad Omen Chance by %d1%
[ICON_BULLET]Increases Omen Effects by %d1%
[ICON_BULLET]Decreases Omen Effects by %d1%
[SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Reduces Bad Omen Chance by %d1%
[SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Increases Bad Omen Chance by %d1%
[SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Increases Omen Effects by %d1%
[SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]Decreases Omen Effects by %d1%
No omens appear life goes on as normal
The omens are [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]prolonged[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]uncertain[COLOR_REVERT]
the Empire
Your seers [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]badly misread[COLOR_REVERT] the omens -%d1 in %s2
Your seers [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]positively[COLOR_REVERT] interpret the omens %d1 in %s2
Your seers in %s1 persude your population to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]ignore[COLOR_REVERT] the potential omens
Your seers in %s1 pronounce the omens [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]benign[COLOR_REVERT] and nothing comes of them
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Auspicious[COLOR_REVERT] fertility omens, +%d1_Num population in %s2
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Terrifying omens[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2 cause citizens to flee; %d1_Num population
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Potent military omens[COLOR_REVERT] inspire the warriors in %s2 to gain %d1_Num Combat Points
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Dibilitating omens[COLOR_REVERT] demotivate the warriors in %s2 and you lose %d1_Num Combat Points
Farmers in %s2 motivated by [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]good omens[COLOR_REVERT], gain %d1_Num[ICON_FOOD]
Farmers in %s2 dismayed by [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]bad omens[COLOR_REVERT], lose %d1_Num[ICON_FOOD]
Traders flock to %s2 given the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]potent omens[COLOR_REVERT]; gain %d1_Num[ICON_GOLD]
Traders shun %s2 with the current [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]uncertain omens[COLOR_REVERT]; lose %d1_Num[ICON_GOLD]
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Inspirational omens[COLOR_REVERT] inspire population: %d1_Num[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] in %s2
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Worrying omens[COLOR_REVERT] cause population to withdraw into themselves: %d1_Num[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] in %s2
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Good omens[COLOR_REVERT] encourage the population in %s2 increasing [ICON_PRODUCTION] by %d1_Num
Population in %s2 lose heart due to [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]bad omens[COLOR_REVERT] causing %d1_Num in [ICON_PRODUCTION]
Troubadors find [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]new muses[COLOR_REVERT] increasing the [ICON_CULTURE] in %s2 by %d1_Num
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Disappearing muses[COLOR_REVERT] cause troubadors to flee reducing [ICON_CULTURE] by %d1_Num in %s2
People flock to your banner due to [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]rising omens[COLOR_REVERT], gain %d1_Num conscripts in %s2
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Positive omens[COLOR_REVERT] cause religious fervour to take hold in %s2; %d1_Num Missionaries
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cheerful omens[COLOR_REVERT] brighten the population in %s2 causing [ICON_HAPPY] for %d1_Num turns
Population in %s2 upset due to [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]dismal omens[COLOR_REVERT] causing [ICON_UNHAPPY] for %d1_Num turns
